articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 64th anniversary of the DPRK led by Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Somalia
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Somalia
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Hassan Sheikh Mohamed upon his election as president of Somalia.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president of Somalia success in his future work for the stability and development of the country.
					
					 He expressed belief that long-standing friendly relations between the DPRK and Somalia would develop in conformity with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian FM
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Mourad Medelci upon his reappointment as foreign minister of Algeria.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional and excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop in the future, too, the message wished the Algerian foreign minister bigger success in his work.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's Farce of "Examination Regarding Forces Following North" Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's Farce of "Examination Regarding Forces Following North" Flailed 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released information bulletin No. 1010 Friday as regards the south Korean army's farce of "examination concerning the forces following the north". The bulletin said:
					 Units of the south Korean army were recently disclosed to have staged the farce of "examination regarding forces following the north" among officers and soldiers, touching off a big furor.
					
					 The south Korean puppet military present more than 120 "problems for the recognition and evaluation of entities following the north" and let officers and men of the army sit for the compulsory examination. They are giving passing grades only when examinees call pro-reunification and democratic forces in south Korea "pro-north leftist forces" that follow the Juche idea and socialist idea.
					
					 Only those who received passing grades are allowed promotion and furlough and those who have not passed the examination are forced to sit for it until they pass.
					
					 In this regard, south Korea's opposition parties and civic and public organizations are calling it a "political intervention for the election of conservative forces in the presidential election" and "revival of yusin-based army".
					
					 However, south Korean "Defense Minister" Kim Kwan Jin and other top military officials are insisting on holding the examination, claiming that "education regarding pro-north forces is essential for soldiers" and "it is quite natural to teach the soldiers the entity of pro-north forces".
					
					 This is a hideous fascist action going against the nation, democracy, reunification and humanity that could not be seen even under the rule of the past military fascist dictatorial regime.
					
					 The examination concerning "pro-north forces" orchestrated by the south Korean military regime is aimed to revive the fading "outlook on the arch enemy" and "theory of principal enemy" within the army and prod servicepersons to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and launch a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Increasing among the army are voices denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime of traitors for its frantic moves for a war against the DPRK and praising the DPRK.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the regime is imposing the "examination" to revive the "outlook on the arch enemy", escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen and raise war awareness.
					
					 This is also the last-ditch efforts to ensure the conservative forces' stay in power in the upcoming "presidential election."
					
					 Those of the puppet military are trying to prolong their remaining days by relying on the conservative regime. So, they use the "examination regarding pro-north forces" to justify the "yusin" dictatorship and make more votes for the "Saenuri Party" candidate in the "election". 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak regime and the "Saenuri Party" at the back of the U.S. are behind the farce of "examination".
					
					 Clear is that south Korea will go back to the dark period of the "yusin" fascist dictatorship, far from coming out for the improvement of north-south relations unless the Lee regime and the "Saenuri Party's" moves for confrontation with the DPRK are foiled.
					
					 South Koreans from all walks of life should heighten vigilance against the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship that gained ill-fame for military coup and fascist suppression, and strongly denounce and reject the moves of "examination".

articles.title: DPRK Will Discharge Its Duty as Nuclear State: Official
articles.content:
DPRK Will Discharge Its Duty as Nuclear State: Official
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The head of the delegation of the Institute for Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Sept. 7 made a speech on the theme "Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty: Ensuring its Vitality" at the Moscow international conference on nuclear disarmament and non-proliferation.
					 The full text of his speech is as follows:
					
					 CTBT basically aims at not allowing the qualitative improvement of the existing nuclear weapons and the development of any new types of nuclear weapons, through banning all sorts of nuclear tests that accompany physical nuclear explosion in the air, outer space and under water and ground.
					
					 Accordingly, all governments that have signed this treaty are neither allowed to conduct nuclear tests or other nuclear explosions inside their own countries nor to be involved in any kinds of acts that instigate or encourage such explosions.
					
					 In a nutshell, the main objective of this treaty is to fundamentally eliminate any possibilities of nuclear development.
					
					 Once this treaty becomes effective and displays its vitality, then there is no doubt that it would make a great contribution to the world peace and stability. However, CTBT still has not come into effect though 16 years has passed after its adoption. Then what could be the reason for that?
					
					 It is because the current situation of the nuclear disarmament is too far distant from the treaty's ideal.
					
					 The realistic and massive nuclear disarmament is the pre-condition for enforcing the treaty.
					
					 But currently, the world-wide nuclear disarmament is not making satisfactory progress due to the disagreements and conflicts in the interests of the main nuclear powers.
					
					 In particular, the U.S., which emerged a nuclear superpower after the end of the Cold War with the Soviet Union, is exerting all its efforts to take pre-emptive measures to prevent the appearance of any other nuclear power and to secure the overwhelming superiority in the strategic nuclear armed forces.
					
					 For this, the U.S. is initiating nuclear disarmament negotiations in order to weaken the nuclear power of the potential enemies while seeking absolute military and strategic supremacy by enforcing qualitative modernization of its nuclear weapons and building strategic missile defense system.
					
					 What is more serious is that the U.S. is enhancing the efficiency of the nuclear weapons without physical nuclear tests by making the ill use of the advanced technology such as sub-critical nuclear testing technologies and thus, deceiving the world public opinion and veiling its sinister intentions.
					
					 As the U.S. is pursuing high-handed politics based on the powerful military capability, still seized with the Cold War way of thinking, tensions have become more acute in the world.
					
					 It is for this reason that other nuclear powers that do not measure up to the U.S. in the overall military and economic capabilities are giving priority to nuclear weapons in their security policy in order to retain their position by maintaining the basic strategic balance.
					
					 In case we avoid the complete elimination of existing nuclear weapons and unilaterally execute CTBT, it would give rise to serious inequality and imbalance in the security of each state and this would rather bring about irretrievable consequences in the global peace and stability.
					
					 Up to the end of 2009, the world recorded a total of 2 054 nuclear tests and 99.99 percent of those were carried out by permanent member states of the United Nations Security Council.
					
					 The nuclear powers conducted many nuclear tests and built up their nuclear arsenal as much as they could and thus monopolized the nuclear weapons.
					
					 Therefore, no more nuclear tests are necessary for them and still, they can exercise their influence as much as they want in the international stage as a nuclear power by depending on their existing nuclear arsenal.
					
					 Given this current situation, countries like the DPRK can not but take the issue of signing CTBT seriously because they are placed in special circumstances beyond control where they need to be equipped with self-defensive nuclear deterrent in order to cope with the direct nuclear threats of the U.S., the only nuclear superpower of the world.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has been enforced for more than half a century to eliminate the DPRK.
					
					 What's more serious is that the U.S. has its national policy of not ruling out the use of nukes in order to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 In the "2010 Nuclear Posture Review", the U.S. refused to give the guarantee to nonuse of nuclear weapons against the DPRK and Iran and thus, made a pre-emptive nuclear strike a fait accompli.
					
					 In addition to this, the U.S. stages frantic nuclear war exercises against the DPRK every year with massive nuclear strike means in and around the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The constant U.S. hostile policy and threats forced the DPRK to carry out nuclear tests twice and possess nuclear deterrent as part of the self-defensive measures aimed at safeguarding the security and sovereign rights of the country.
					
					 Even countries like France and UK that are not directly under the threats of war as being member states of the NATO, regard the nuclear deterrent as a guarantee for ensuring sovereignty and peace.   So it is needless to say that the DPRK should take the same approach to defend itself.
					
					 Unless the U.S. hostile policy and its nuclear threats are completely withdrawn and a solid and permanent peace regime is in place on the Korean Peninsula, the DPRK is left with no other choice but to steadily strengthen its self-defensive nuclear deterrent to the standard as it deems necessary.
					
					 It is so clear that unless the U.S., the nuclear superpower which is allegedly playing a "pivotal role" in the world peace and stability, abandon its plan to seize the military supremacy based on the modernized nuclear weapons and give up its nuclear threats to the anti-imperialist independent countries like the DPRK, the prevention of nuclear weapons development through CTBT would remain a mission impossible.
					
					 Only when CTBT is enforced under the pre-condition that the nuclear weapons would be completely removed on a worldwide scale can all states be granted practically equal and just obligations and rights.
					
					 In that sense, the more pressing issue than enforcing CTBT is to establish an international legal framework on unconditional ban on the use and complete removal of existing nuclear weapons worldwide and work out impartial and proportionate measures for nuclear disarmament and removal based on mutual trust.
					
					 In order to make CTBT effective in the reality, its pre-conditions should be ready and for that, the main nuclear powers should fulfill their responsibility and duty in the efforts to thoroughly remove the source of the nuclear war in the world.
					
					 Especially it is important for the U.S., a nuclear superpower of the world, to promptly stop all acts of military buildup that destroy the world stability such as modernizing and conventionalizing nuclear weapons as well as developing new ultra-modern weapons in substitute for nukes.
					
					 Unless the U.S. puts an end to these maneuvers, we would never see the folding up of arms race among the great powers aimed at defending their own security and strategic interests and this would produce grave consequences to the world peace and stability.
					
					 As repeatedly clarified, the DPRK would discharge its responsibility and duty as a responsible nuclear state for the nuclear non-proliferation in the future.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from President of Central African Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from President of Central African Republic
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Francois Bozize Yangoubonda, president of the Central African Republic, on September 5.
					 The president in his message said that he had particular honor to extend the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and the government of the Central African Republic and on his own behalf on the occasion of the anniversary of the beautiful DPRK.
					
					 He expressed confidence that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would become stronger.
					
					 He sent highest fraternal regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Felicitations from Personages of Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Felicitations from Personages of Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, received congratulatory messages and letters from personages of various countries on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They included the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist), chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, general secretary and international secretary of the New Yugoslavia Communist Party and the spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist).
					
					 Among them were also a secretary of the Central Committee of the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks and other dignitaries in political, social and economic circles of China, Russia, Nepal, Malaysia, Indonesia, Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Finland, UK, Austria, Nigeria and Benin, and representatives of Juche idea study organizations, organizations supporting the reunification of Korea and organizations for friendship with the Korean people in those countries.
					
					 In their messages and letters, they sent warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who led to victory the great anti-Japanese war to achieve the historic cause of the country's liberation and made undying contributions to the prosperity of the country will shine forever, they added.
					
					 They expressed conviction that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Greece
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Greece
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a congratulatory message from Carlos Papoulias, president of the Republic of Greece, on September 7.
					 He in the message warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the people of Greece and on his own behalf and sincerely wished the  people of the DPRK well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Sao Tome and Principe
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Manuel Pinto Da Costa, president of Sao Tome and Principe, on Sept. 3.
					 The president in his message extended, on behalf of the people of Sao Tome and Principe and on his own behalf, the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the anniversary of the DPRK, wishing him many successes in his work and the Korean people progress and glory.
					
					 Availing himself of this opportunity, the president expressed belief that the relations of friendship, solidarity and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the days ahead.
					
					 The president sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean President
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, president of Equatorial Guinea, on Sept. 3.
					 The president in his message said he was pleased to extend, on behalf of the people of Equatorial Guinea and on his own behalf, the sincerest warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the the DPRK.
					
					 The president expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation existing between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 He sent highest regards to his dear friend Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Togolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Togolese President 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, president of the Republic of Togo, on September 7.
					 The president in his message extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and government of Togo and on his own behalf at a time when the great Korean people were celebrating the anniversary of the DPRK with joy and jubilation.
					
					 Availing himself of this happy occasion, the president expressed his sincere satisfaction over the good relations between Togo and the DPRK and reiterated his will to work together with Kim Jong Un to boost and diversify the friendly and cooperative relations for the common prosperity of the two countries.
					
					 Sincerely wishing Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people steady progress and peace, the president sent highest regards to him.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Macky Sall, president of Senegal, on Sept. 7.
					 The Senegalese president in his message sent the warmest felicitations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and government of Senegal on the occasion of the anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Un good health and the fraternal Korean people prosperity.
					
					 Availing himself of this opportunity, he reiterated his invariable will to make positive efforts for the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 He sent highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Tajikistan
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Tajikistan
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Emomali Rahmon, president of the Republic of Tajikistan, on September 6.
					 He in the message said that he had the honor to extend sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					 The president, availing himself of this significant opportunity, wished Kim Jong Un good health and success and the friendly people of the DPRK peace, stability, well-being and prosperity.
					
					 He sent his regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from King of Bahrain
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from King of Bahrain
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Hamad Bin Isa al-Khalifa, king of Bahrain, on September 2.
					 He in the message said that he was happy to extend sincere salute, warm felicitations and the best wishes to Kim Jong Un on his own behalf and on behalf of the people of Bahrain on the occasion of the anniversary of the friendly DPRK.
					
					 He, availing himself of this opportunity, sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity under his wise leadership.
					
					 He sent high regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Spanish Youth Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Spanish Youth Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain led by General Secretary Juan Nogueira Lopez visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President at Mangyongdae the members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved there with care, being briefed on the immortal story about the old home.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said the President was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family, adding he started his revolutionary activities when he was young and liberated the country.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Mansudae Art Studio, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, Kyongsang Kindergarten, etc.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Tours Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Tours Area of Mt. Paektu
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here toured the area of Mt. Paektu from Sept. 12 to 14 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They visited the Samjiyon Grand Monument where they laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung before paying tribute to him in deep reverence.
					
					 They looked round various group sculptures there.
					
					 Then they visited Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il was born in a log cabin, nurturing the spirit of Paektu, they looked round historic relics.
					
					 Military Attache of the Iranian embassy Hassan Reza Husseini, doyen of the military attaches corps, wrote in a visitor's book that he was honored to visit the log cabin of the headquarters where Kim Il Sung worked and the birthplace of Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan secret camp, adding the visit to those places helped him know better about the revolutionary history of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Zhang Ping, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy, said:
					
					 The Paektusan secret camp is a holy land of revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il trained matchless pluck and gained wisdom, experiencing the harsh trials of the hard-fought great anti-Japanese war.
					
					 He grew as a great revolutionary, hearing the gunfire during the war.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are waging a vigorous struggle, displaying the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 I am sure that the people of the DPRK would register great successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Members of the military attaches corps climbed Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of revolution.
					
					 They overlooked the grand spectacle of the holy mountain, the spectacular shore of the Lake Chon and the mountain ranges on the top of the mountain.
					
					 At the end of the tour Dmitri Zheleznikov, military attache of the Russian embassy, said:
					
					 Mt. Paektu is a significant place associated with the history of the Korean revolution. Under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters waged a courageous armed struggle against the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, said that he was deeply touched to see the grand spectacle of the mountain.
					
					 The members of the corps also visited Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Paektu Museum, Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace, Hall of Culture in Samjiyon County, etc.

articles.title: Press Interview Held in Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Press Interview Held in Russian Embassy
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A press interview took place at the Russian embassy here on Friday.
					 Present there were mediapersons, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of Cuba and Brazil and members of embassies of several countries.
					
					 The correspondent of the ITARÔºçTASS and members of the Russian embassy were present there.
					
					 Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, made a speech.
					
					 He said that the summit meeting of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) was held in Vladivostok City, Russia and a series of issues were discussed.
					
					 There were answers to the questions.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Pro-Reunification Patriot
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Pro-Reunification Patriot 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un Friday sent a birthday spread to Pak Mun Jae, indomitable pro-reunification patriot, on his 90th birthday. 
					 This reflected profound trust reposed in Pak who waged an indomitable struggle, regarding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as his mainstay. 
					
					 He experienced bitter sorrow as a member of the stateless nation from his early years. He could enjoy a worthwhile life only after the President liberated the country. 
					
					 He devotedly worked for the building of a new country as an official of a youth organization after the country's liberation. During the Fatherland Liberation War he was arrested by the enemy and for nearly 30 years in prison he remained faithful to the revolutionary principle despite the enemy's cruel torture and persistent appeasement. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un bestowed upon him the honor of being a delegate to the celebrations of the Day of the Sun and war victory day.

articles.title: 10th National Ssirum Tournament Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
10th National Ssirum Tournament Begins in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The 10th National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize began on Rungna Islet here on Friday.
					 It brought together more than 70 wrestlers selected from Pyongyang and Nampho cities and provinces of the country.
					
					 It is divided into team event and open-category event. 
					
					 The tournament started with team event. Each team is made up of five players, of which one under 15 and another above 60.
					
					 Spectators burst out cheers when players showed skillful techniques.
					
					  A top winner in the catch-weight event will take the nearly one-tonnage bull.
					
					 Its finals are scheduled for September 17.

articles.title: 9th National Folk Games of Agricultural Workers Held
articles.content:
9th National Folk Games of Agricultural Workers Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The 9th national folk games of agricultural workers closed on Friday. They were opened at the Moranbong Pleasure Park on Wednesday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The games brought together more than 300 agricultural workers selected at provincial contests. The participants competed in Taekwon-Do, Korean wrestling (ssirum), yut-game, swing and seesawing events.
					
					 Korean wrestling contests drew keen attention of people.
					
					 Namap Cooperative Farm of Yomju County, North Phyongan Province came first in Korean wrestling.
					
					 The Stock Farm in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province proved successful in Taekwon-Do, Jongbang Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province in yut-game, and Sinam Cooperative Farm in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province in seesawing and swing events.
					
					 North Hwanghae Province placed first in provincial standings. 
					
					 Commendations, silk banners, cups and medals went to those organizations and participants that proved successful.

articles.title: DPRK Children Benefit from Healthcare System
articles.content:
DPRK Children Benefit from Healthcare System 
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea children enjoys great benefits from the healthcare system.
					 There are nurseries in all urban and rural communities of the country. Weekly nurseries and kindergartens are also run. Motherless children are brought up at orphanages at public expense.
					
					 Each nursery has a doctor and some nurseries have even children's wards.
					
					 A medical service system exclusively for children was established at hospitals at all levels across the country.
					
					 All the children throughout the country take vaccination on a regular basis free of charge.
					
					 They receive routine checkups and are supplied with medicines in accordance with the results.
					
					 Women, believed to be pregnant with triplets, get diagnosis at Pyongyang Maternity Hospital. If they are confirmed, they are hospitalized. The state pays for the triplets growing up at nurseries until they turn four years old.
					
					 The DPRK government set every August and September as the months for supporting nurseries and kindergartens, during which a series of measures are taken for children's health.

articles.title: National Floricultural Show Opens
articles.content:
National Floricultural Show Opens
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A national floricultural show was opened with due ceremony at the April 15 Children's Flower Garden on Friday.
					 The show, an annual event from this year, is of great significance in developing the nation's floriculture and providing the people with better conditions for cultural and emotional life.
					
					 Displayed in the show are more than 20 000 potted flowers of over 200 species and flower shrubs presented by at least 60 units in Pyongyang and local areas. They include the Ministry of Urban Management, Pyongyang Horticultural Guidance Bureau and General Bureau of Pleasure Grounds, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 Also on display are exhibits showing various methods of decoration by use of flowers and flower shrubs including floral baskets, hedges and plant sculptures.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Vice-Premier Kim In Sik, Chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Cha Hui Rim, officials concerned, officials in the fields of urban management and gardening from across the country, horticultural experts and flower lovers.
					
					 Hwang Hak Won, minister of Urban Management, said in his opening speech that the show would offer a significant occasion in swapping achievements and experience gained in cultivating, using and disseminating flowers in the past period, solving scientific and technical issues and thus increasing the social concern for flowers and making a socialist cultural and emotional life prevail throughout the country.
					
					 The show will last till Sept. 18.

articles.title: Chinese Workers Saved from Critical Condition in DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Workers Saved from Critical Condition in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Six Chinese workers were saved from a critical condition after being hit hard by heavy rains and landslide in a mining area of Jangjin County, South Hamgyong Province.
					 On August 28, typhoon-15 struck Jangjin County as well as other areas of the DPRK, causing heavy rains and landslide and inflicting huge losses upon its residents.
					
					 The flood-stricken mine was left without any contact with outside, looking like an isolated islet.
					
					 The Chinese workers active there were also in hard conditions.
					
					 The residents and the Chinese workers strove hard to overcome the disaster, sharing warm feelings, but their conditions became from bad to worse as the days go by as there was lack of food and medicine.
					
					 Upon learning about this, the dear respected Kim Jong Un gave an instruction to conduct an operation to rescue the Chinese workers.
					
					 By an order of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, a helicopter flew to the area but faced great difficulties.
					
					 The worsening weather conditions and the landslide made it hard for the copter to spot the mining area and find any proper place for landing.
					
					 It succeeded in landing thanks to the matchless courage of its pilots and conveyed relief goods, but it could not take off due to its damaged aerofoil. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un sent a plane there, saying the Chinese workers should be rescued come what may.
					
					 The Chinese workers were finally rescued from the natural disaster thanks to the strong sense of internationalist obligation and warm loving care of Kim Jong Un who has paid deep attention to developing the DPRK-China friendly relations provided and valued by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Upon deplaning, they went to the Chinese embassy here and asked it to convey their profound thanks to the DPRK side.

articles.title: Flood, Typhoon Bring Big Damage to DPRK
articles.content:
Flood, Typhoon Bring Big Damage to DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The flood and typhoon that swept most areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from mid-June to late August caused heavy casualties and material losses in the country
					 According to data available, 300 people were confirmed dead and another 600 injured and missing throughout the country.
					
					 The devastating flood damaged, destroyed and submerged more than 87 280 houses, leaving 298 050 people homeless.
					
					 About 123 380 hectares of farmland were inundated, buried and washed away and at least 2 690 public and industrial buildings and some 350 educational and healthcare buildings destroyed.
					
					 92 drinking water supply systems, 40 sewage and drainage systems and more than 1 300 hectares of saltern were ravaged and 16 900 road trees fell down.
					
					 The flood washed away 131 kilometers of power-transmission line and 160 kilometers of electric cable, tumbling down a number of power poles.
					
					 50 odd coal pits were submerged and collapsed, with 180 cutting grounds and coal faces inundated.
					
					 More than 17 150 square meters of railroad were washed away and over 300 sections of railway covered by landslide, with scores of tunnels and railway bridges damaged.
					
					 In particular, the country was seriously affected by the typhyoon-15 that hit its most areas on August 28-29.
					
					 The typhoon left 59 people dead, another 50 missing, more than 8 100 houses destroyed or submerged and 26 320 people homeless.
					
					 The typhoon-triggered flood inundated, buried and washed away 51 600 hectares of farmland throughout the country, bringing big damage to crops yet to be harvested.
					
					 Some 960 public and industrial buildings were destroyed wholly or partially and submerged.
					
					 The hardest-hit area is Komdok with the nation's major mines. 34 people were confirmed dead and 42 others missing in the area.

articles.title: Typhoon-16 Moves toward South Sea of Korea
articles.content:
Typhoon-16 Moves toward South Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Typhoon-16, formed in the sea southeast of the Philippines, is moving toward the South Sea of Korea.
					 The typhoon was located in the sea east of central Philippines as of 03:00 Friday.
					
					 With 900 hpa in the center, it has a maximum wind speed of 55 meters per second. It has a radius of 240 kilometers with wind speed of over 25 meters per second and a radius of 540 kilometers with wind speed of over 15 meters per second, and its velocity is 18 kilometers per hour.
					
					 The typhoon will reach the south coast of South Jolla Province and pass through North Kyongsang Province, moving northeast through the sea off Wonsan City.
					
					 It is forecast that the typhoon will affect Korea on September 17-18.

articles.title: Seriously Burned Woman Completely Cured
articles.content:
Seriously Burned Woman Completely Cured
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A medical staff of the South Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital miraculously saved a seriously burned woman from her critical condition.
					 On June 20 Kim Sun Nyo who had gotten second-third degrees burns on 50 percent of her body was admitted to the hospital.
					
					 The medical staff succeeded in relieving her of shock thanks to their intensive care though her recovery was believed to be impossible at the outset. 
					
					 Skin grafting began 18 days later.
					
					 During the operations more than 200 people including officials, doctors and nurses of the hospital vied with each other to come to the operation room and unhesitatingly donated their skin to her.
					
					 Doctors did all their sincerity to effectively treat her, closely observing her condition.
					
					 Their sincere care helped her fully recover her health and leave the hospital in 80 days of hospitalization.
					
					 Leaving the hospital amid the blessings of people, she pledged herself to work heart and soul for the world's best socialist system in the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism in Practice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism in Practice
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" is encouraging the Korean people to perform patriotic feats, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a bylined article.
					 The country will emerge a thriving socialist nation only when ardent patriotism is given full play, the article says, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's is genuine patriotism which is displayed in stirring revolutionary practice and its vitality has been proved in realities. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il taught in practices what is patriotism in the present era in the protracted course of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 Reflected in Kim Jong Il's patriotism are the work style and traits those living in the era of building a thriving nation should have.
					
					 The work to embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism in practice is not confined to any period of revolution but an important work which should be carried on till the final victory in the drive to build a thriving nation.
					
					 What is the most important is to have an absolute and unconditional stand to fully embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism in practice.
					
					 One should have such sincere will to spruce up one's worksite, village and street by oneself and work hard to do any work though it may belong to other field and one is not obliged to do it. This work style as a master should be fully displayed in work and life.
					
					 One should be ready to sacrifice everything for the country, even one's life, happiness and family. This is the core of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is an absolute devotee and personifier of Kim Jong Il's patriotism. As long as the DPRK is led by Kim Jong Un, the patriotic cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving nation, is sure to be accomplished, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Policy of Toeing U.S. Policy under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Policy of Toeing U.S. Policy under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The present collapse of the inter-Korean relations is the natural outcome of the south Korean Lee Myung puppet regime's policy of toeing outsiders' policies and its moves to escalate confrontation with compatriots. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. It cites facts to prove this.
					
					 The successive regimes in south Korea have been nothing but tools for the U.S. colonial rule as their bosses have been running dogs for carrying out its policy of aggression, it notes, and goes on:.
					
					 No sooner had the Lee group seized power than enforced the worst pro-U.S. sycophantic policy, further deepening the U.S. colonial rule over south Korea and subjugation in all its fields including politics, military and economy. 
					
					 It cried out for "tightened alliance" with the U.S. contrary to the desire of the nation for independence, reviving south Korea's relations of dependence upon the U.S. in all fields.
					
					 The Lee group even said it was a "big mistake" that ancestors set fire to the U.S. ship for aggression "General Sherman" and sent it to the bottom of the river and later erected "monuments to beating back the foreign aggression" in various places. It added that "such mistake should not be repeated."
					
					 Describing the idea of "By our nation itself" reflected in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration as "narrow-minded nationalism" and "chauvinistic nationalism", the Lee group spelled out "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" as "a policy toward the north", a replica of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, seriously bedeviling the north-south relations.
					
					 Asserting that dialogue is possible only when "the north dismantles its nukes," the group derailed all north-south dialogues and cooperation undertakings under the pretext of the nuclear issue. It worked with bloodshot eyes to ratchet up sanctions against the DPRK worldwide in close cooperation with its American master. It, at the same time, kicked up a noisy anti-DPRK racket not only in south Korea but even in the international arena over the non-existent "human rights issue" at the zealous prodding of the U.S.
					
					 The Lee group in zealous pursuance of the U.S. policy is mainly aimed at doing harm to compatriots by force of arms, backed by its master.
					
					 The Korean nation can neither pave the way for independent reunification, peace and prosperity nor escape a war disaster as long as such worst sycophants and traitors are allowed to stay in office, concludes the article.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Sycophantic, Treacherous Acts Slammed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Sycophantic, Treacherous Acts Slammed 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an Internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., carried an article contributed by its editor on Sept. 9 denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea for his sycophantic and treacherous acts.
					 The article said that a campaign is gaining momentum to brand Lee Myung Bak as a sycophant and traitor. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Lee, while meeting the U.S. secretary of State recently, cried out for cooperation with the U.S. and Japan, raising a hue and cry over the "nuclear issue of the north". Then he met the Japanese prime minister, asserting that he would cooperate to develop the relations with Japan in a forward-looking manner.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula is a product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the north. Any attempt of traitor Lee to misinterpret it and bring the north to its knees in collusion with outside forces only reveals the true colors of Lee as a sycophant and traitor.
					
					 It is only sycophant and traitor who can cooperate with Japan keen to grab Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of the Korean nation.
					
					 Persisting in these sycophantic and treacherous acts after coming to power, Lee has bedeviled the north-south relations and mercilessly cracked down upon the patriotic forces aspiring after the independent and peaceful reunification of the country on charges of violation of the "Security Law."
					
					 Therefore, compatriots at home and abroad can no longer pardon Lee Myung Bak and the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Organization Lauds Brilliant Commander of Songun
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Organization Lauds Brilliant Commander of Songun
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans released the August issue of its bulletin "Thongil".
					 The bulletin carried a photo of leader Kim Jong Il in a column titled "Special write-up devoted the 52nd anniversary of start of Songun revolutionary leadership".
					
					 Under the title of "Brilliant commander in era of Songun" the bulletin carried an article praising the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by weathering difficulties and ordeals with arms and thus protecting the dignity and destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 The bulletin carried the gist of a speech made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at a banquet given in celebration of August 25.
					
					 It also carried his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" and a congratulatory message he sent to the participants in the meeting for celebrating Youth Day and all other youth of the country.
					
					 Under the caption "Kim Jong Un, focus of world", the bulletin said that world media praised him as a leader who gained the greatest popularity in the shortest time in the world.
					
					 The bulletin carried a news agency report of Russia that Kim Jong Un inspected islet defence detachments in the biggest hotspots in the southernmost part of the southwestern sector of the front and issued his order to them.
					
					 It also conveyed news that the leaders of the DPRK and Russia exchanged messages of greeting and events were held in the DPRK in memory of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in the run-up to the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The bulletin carried a statement made by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' DPRK-targeted joint military maneuvers and a memorandum issued by the ministry titled "U.S. hostile policy toward DPRK is chief obstacle to settlement of nuclear issue of Korean Peninsula".

articles.title: U.S., S. Korea Do Not Want Detente: Voice of Russia
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Do Not Want Detente: Voice of Russia 
						
 Moscow, September 13 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The Voice of Russia on Sept. 12 reported as follows as regards the provocative joint military drills of the U.S. and south Korea:
					 Had the army of the DPRK staged a military drill for invading south Korea, the world would have accused the DPRK. Maybe, the UN Security Council might have called an emergency meeting and called for calming down the invaders. 
					
					 But when Dong-A Ilbo of south Korea reported that the U.S. and south Korea staged joint military exercises for invading the DPRK some time ago, the world made almost no response. 
					
					 Asmolov, expert of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, said it is clear that double standards are being applied in evaluating the situation of the Korean Peninsula. When the DPRK launched an artificial satellite, the world became fussy as if it launched "Seoul-targeted" or "Tokyo-targeted" missile. However, when south Korea staged a military drill for invading the DPRK, the world made no response to it. 
					
					 The south Korean army together with the U.S. forces staged the joint military exercises in August. 
					
					 The purpose of the exercises has recently been disclosed. It was for the south Korean army to occupy the DPRK and stabilize the situation after the occupation.
					
					 In particular, the south Korean army and the U.S. army staged the exercises for unifying the north and the south of Korea by a military way, recovering the work of the administrative bodies of the DPRK and providing the residents with humanitarian aids. 
					
					 Asmolov said in the past they staged military exercises simulating an "attack" by the DPRK. South Korea would have asserted that it was its right for it to stage military exercises to defend itself from outside enemy. But, now the essence of the military exercises approached to provocation. The purpose of such military exercises is not only to provoke the DPRK but display its hostility as regards the interests of the Asia-Pacific region as a whole, Asmolov added. 
					
					 South Korean "President" Lee Myung Bak thinks that unification of the Korean Peninsula should be achieved by way of the south's absorption of the north. 
					
					 The DPRK views it as the declaration of a war. 
					
					 It is by no means accidental that leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un ordered the whole army to be ready for action. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un examined the operational plan to move on to all-out counterattack to cope with the enemies' moves and finally signed it. 
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises showed that the U.S. and south Korea do not want detente on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The military exercises have increased the possibility of the situation on the peninsula developing toward the use of the armed forces. 
					
					 Surely, the DPRK will revise its military principle and its media will launch a new campaign against the enemies of the nation in the south.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Italian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet by Italian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted on Internet website "Juche-Songun" by the Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy on Sept. 8.
					 The work, published on January 29, 2003, clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era in which President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army have been carried forward and developed. It also clarifies the idea that it is a scientific revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Works of the dear respected Kim Jong Un were carried by foreign papers.
					 The full text or detailed gist of his work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Advancing under the Uplifted Immortal Banners Bearing Portraits of Smiling Great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" were given publicity by the Russian Internet paper B Contaktse and the Namibian paper New Era on Aug. 27 and on Sept. 5.
					
					 The Nepali paper Nepal Today carried the full text of his work on September 9.
					
					 This speech made by him at the banquet given in celebration of Aug. 25, 2012 deals with the Songun feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for vigorously struggling for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun started and led to victory by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A detailed gist of his work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was carried by the Myanmar papers Live News and The Voice on September 8.
					
					 The work, published on July 26, 2012, clarifies the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his noble love for the country and its people.
					
					 It clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Events Held in Foreign Countries to Mark DPRK Anniversary
articles.content:
Events Held in Foreign Countries to Mark DPRK Anniversary 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Vietnam, Bangladesh, Peru and Sweden on Sept. 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present at the events were personages from all walks of life and other people of relevant countries.
					
					 The chairman of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association said that the founding of the DPRK was an event of historic significance as it was a brilliant fruition of the heroic struggle waged by the Korean people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Noting that he was rejoiced at the important successes made by the Korean people over the last 64 years, he expressed conviction that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties between the two parties, the two states and the two peoples would steadily grow.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and other speakers said that the feats of the President would always be remembered by progressive mankind with the century.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started by the President, adding that Kim Jong Il's patriotic feats would go down in history as he reliably protected the destiny of the country and its people with arms and paved a wide avenue for the prosperity of the country by dint of Songun.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, curator of the Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru and other speakers noted that the DPRK would demonstrate its dignity as a thriving socialist nation under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association stressed that the founding of the DPRK greatly encouraged the people of the whole world in their struggle for independence against colonialism and imperialism.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Sweden.

articles.title: Indian, Syrian Figures Greet Korean People on DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Indian, Syrian Figures Greet Korean People on DPRK's Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Indian and Syrian figures released statements on Sept. 5 and 6 on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Harising Khan, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), noted that the Korean people have covered a shining path since President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, founded the DPRK.
					
					 He said that the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity and might as an independent power in the international arena.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, successor to the idea and cause of the President, reliably defended the gains of socialism by decisively smashing all sorts of anti-DPRK moves of the imperialist allied forces through his independent Songun politics.
					
					 It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the DPRK grew to be an invincible socialist power.
					
					 He expressed belief that all people of the DPRK would surely build a thriving socialist nation without fail by weathering all sorts of ordeals under the outstanding and seasoned leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of Syrian University of Damascus, said that the founding of the DPRK meant the birth of the first people's democratic state and the genuine people's country in the East, and it was a historic event which opened the road of building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Speaking highly of the DPRK demonstrating its might as an independent power, he expressed belief that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea would dynamically keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism as declared by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stand Hailed by British Bodies
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stand Hailed by British Bodies 
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- British social bodies released a joint statement on Sept. 1 to express support for the just stand of the DPRK clarified in the memorandum of its Foreign Ministry.
					 The organizations include the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association.
					
					 The statement noted that the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK is the root cause of the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. has never stopped such a policy so far, it said, adding:
					
					 It has grossly violated the 1953 Armistice Agreement immediately after it was concluded.
					
					 It has persistently pursued the hostile policy in violation of the 1994 DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework, agreements reached at the six-party talks and the Feb. 29 agreement this year, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. tried to use nukes against the DPRK several times and after singling it out as the target of a preemptive nuclear strike, the U.S. has increased the nuclear threat to the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 The U.S. has imposed sanctions on the DPRK one after another and let the UN Security Council adopt a resolution on slapping sanctions against it, the statement said.
					
					 As long as the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK goes on, it will further bolster its nuclear deterrent, the statement concluded.

articles.title: Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana
articles.content:
Raul Castro Ruz Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy in Havana
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Sept. 10 in celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla also sent a floral basket to the embassy on the same day.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia "examen sobre las fuerzas pro-Norte" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia "examen sobre las fuerzas pro-Norte" del Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en el ejercito titere del Sur de Corea se realiza el supuesto "examen sobre las fuerzas por-Norte", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 14 la informacion no.1010 como sigue:.
					  Recientemente en el Sur de Corea se revelo el hecho de que se realiza el supuesto "examen sobre las fuerzas por-Norte" entre los oficiales y soldados de las unidades del ejercito titere, lo que causo gran escandalo.
					
					  La banda de la capa militar titere presento en dicho examen mas de 120 "puntos sobre la cognicion y evaluacion de las fuerzas pro-Norte" y les obligo participar en el examen, el cual aprueba solo a quienes escriben a las fuerzas democraticas por la reunificacion del Sur de Corea como "fuerzas  izquierdistas pro-Norte" que adhieren a la idea Juche y siguen al ideal socialista.
					
					Ademas aplica solo a los aprobados en el examen el ascenso y vacaciones y obliga participar en el examen a los suspendidos hasta que fueran aprobados.
					
					Al respecto, los partidos opositores y las entidades civiles y sociales del Sur de Corea lo critican calificandolo como "intervencion politica para elegir a las fuerzas conservadoras en las elecciones presidenciales" y "rehabilitacion del ejercito de renovacion", etc.
					
					Sin embargo,  el ministro de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin y otros caudillos de la capa militar pretenden seguir este examen diciendo que la "educacion sobre las fuerzas pro-Norte es la educacion espiritual indispensable para el ejercito y es natural ensenar correctamente la existencia de las fuerzas pro-Norte en el ejercito".
					
					Tal farsa deviene la atrocidad antinacional, anti-democratica, anti-reunificacion, anti-etica y fascista nunca vista ni en los anteriores "poderes" de la dictadura fascista militar.
					
					El pueril examen en cuestion persigue el intento malsano de resucitar la "concepcion del enemigo" y la "teoria sobre enemigo principal" que van desapareciendo dentro del ejercito titere e incitar a los oficiales y soldados a la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					Ahora en el ejercito titere se elevan cada dia mas las voces de condena a la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak enloquecida por la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea y de apoyo y simpatia a la RPDC.
					
					Por tal motivo, para resucitar la "concepcion del enemigo" e inculcar la conciencia fratricida y de guerra, ellos obligan participar en el susodicho examen.
					
					Ademas esta farsa deviene los ultimos esfuerzos por realizar la retoma del poder de la banda conservadora en las proximas "elecciones presidenciales".
					
					Con el fin de sostener los dias contados de vida en virtud de la dilacion del "poder" conservador, los compinches de la capa militar titere intentan justificar la dictadura de "renovacion" a traves del "examen sobre las fuerzas pro-Norte" y dar los votos del ejercito titere al candidato del "Partido Saenuri" en las "elecciones presidenciales".
					
					Detras de esta farsa, estan la banda de Lee Myung Bak y el "Partido Saenuri" controlados por Estados Unidos.
					
					Mientras que no se frustren las maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC de la horda de Lee Myung Bak y el "Partido Saenuri", sera natural que en el Sur de Corea retorne la dictadura fascista de "renovacion" lejos de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Los distintos estratos del Sur de Corea deben redoblar la vigilancia sobre la restablecimiento de la capa militar de "renovacion" de mala fama como golpe de Estado y aparato de represion fascista y denunciar y rechazar fuertemente las maniobras de "examen sobre las fuerzas pro-Norte" antinacional, anti-reunificacion y antidemocratico.

articles.title: RPDC cumplira el papel de pais responsable con armas nucleares
articles.content:
RPDC cumplira el papel de pais responsable con armas nucleares 
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El jefe de la delegacion de Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio el dia 7 un discurso con el tema de "Tratado Comprensivo de Prohibicion de Prueba: Aseguramiento de su vitalidad" en la conferencia internacional de Moscu sobre el desarme nuclear y la no-proliferacion.
					Abajo se transmite el texto integro del discurso: 
					
					El CTBT (siglas de Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty) se encamina basicamente a no permitir el mejoramiento cualitativo de las existentes armas nucleares y el desarrollo de cualquier nuevo tipo de los mismos artefactos, mediante la prohibicion de las pruebas nucleares de toda clase que acompanan la explosion nuclear fisica en el aire, el espacio y debajo del mar y la tierra.
					
					En virtud de ese tratado, los gobiernos de todos los paises firmantes no pueden realizar en su propio pais ninguna prueba de explosion de armas nucleares ni incorporarse en ninguna accion que pueda provocar o fomentar tal explosion. 
					
					En una palabra, la meta principal del CTBT es eliminar fundamentalmente la posibilidad del desarrollo de armas nucleares. 
					
					En el caso de que el CTBT ponga en vigencia, hara indudablemente un gran aporte a asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Lo problematico es que a los 16 anos desde la publicacion del CTBT, este no se ha llevado todavia a efecto a causa de que la situacion actual de desarme nuclear es tan distante del ideal del tratado.
					
					El desarme nuclear efectivo e intensivo es la premisa del cumplimiento del CTBT. 
					
					  Pero, en la actualidad el desarme nuclear en escala mundial no esta dando progreso satisfactorio debido a los diferendos y conflictos en funcion de los intereses de las principales potencias nucleares.
					
					En particular, Estados Unidos, que emergio como superpotencia nuclear despues del fin de la Guerra Fria con la Union Sovietica, esta dedicando todos sus esfuerzos por tomar medidas para prevenir la aparicion de otra potencia nuclear y asegurar la superioridad absoluta en las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					  Por eso, EE.UU. inicio las negociaciones de desarme nuclear para debilitar el poder nuclear de los enemigos potenciales mientras persigue la supremacia militar y estrategica absoluta impulsando la modernizacion cualitativa de sus armas nucleares y construyendo el sistema de defensa de misiles estrategicos.
					
					El problema mas serio esta en que EE.UU. mejora la eficiencia de sus armas nucleares sin las pruebas nucleares fisicas abusando de las tecnologias avanzadas como las de prueba nuclear sub-critica con el fin de distraer la opinion publica mundial y encubrir sus siniestras intenciones.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. persigue las politicas autoritarias basadas en la gran capacidad militar, atrapado todavia por el modo de pensar de la Guerra Fria, las tensiones se hicieron mas agudas en el mundo.
					
					 Por esta razon, otras potencias nucleares que no pueden alcanzar a EE.UU. en la capacidad militar y economica en general, estan dando prioridad a las armas nucleares en sus politicas de seguridad para defender su posicion manteniendo el equilibro estrategico basico.
					
					  En el caso de que evadamos la eliminacion completa de las existentes armas nucleares y ejecutemos unilateralmente el CTBT, esto produciria seria desigualdad y desequilibro en la seguridad de cada Estado y causaria consecuencias irremediables en la paz y estabilidad del mundo.
					
					 Hasta el fin del ano 2009, el mundo registro un total de 2054 pruebas nucleares y el 99.99 por ciento de estas fueron realizadas por los miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  Las potencias nucleares llevaron a cabo muchas pruebas nucleares y construyeron su arsenal nuclear hasta que pudieron monopolizar las armas nucleares.
					
					  Por lo tanto, no son necesarias mas pruebas nucleares para ellas que pueden ejercer sus influencias cuanto quisieran en la arena internacional como potencia nuclear apoyandose en su existente arsenal nuclear.
					
					Dada esta situacion, los paises como la RPDC no tienen otro remedio que examinar seriamente el problema de firmar el CTBT porque se hallan en las circunstancias especiales que obligan a tener el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa para hacer frente a las amenazas nucleares directas de EE.UU., unica superpotencia nuclear del mundo.
					
					  La politica hostil de EE.UU. sobre la RPDC ha sido endurecida durante mas de medio siglo para eliminar a la RPDC.
					
					 Lo mas serio es que EE.UU. tiene su politica nacional de no reparar en el uso de armas nucleares para atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					 En el "Panorama de la Postura Nuclear 2010", EE.UU. rehuso a dar la garantia de no uso de armas nucleares contra la RPDC e Iran y asi hizo de ataque preventivo nuclear un hecho consumado.
					
					 Ademas, EE.UU. realiza todos los anos freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC con los medios de ataque nuclear masivo en la Peninsula Coreana y sus periferias.
					
					  La constante politica hostil de EE.UU. y sus amenazas obligaron a la RPDC a realizar dos veces las pruebas nucleares y poseer el disuasivo nuclear como parte de las medidas de autodefensa orientadas a salvaguardar la seguridad y los derechos soberanos del pais.
					
					  Hasta los paises como Francia y Gran Bretana, que no estan sometidos directamente a las amenazas de guerra por ser miembros de la OTAN, consideran el disuasivo nuclear como una garantia de soberania y paz. Por eso, es muy natural que la RPDC tomara la misma actitud para la defensa legitima.
					
					 Antes de que sean eliminadas completamente la politica hostil de EE.UU. y su amenaza nuclear y se implante en la Peninsula Coreana un sistema de paz permanente, a la RPDC no le queda otra opcion que fortalecer continuamente su disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa al nivel que estime necesario.
					
					Esta claro que a menos que EE.UU., superpotencia mundial que se considera jugar un "rol importante" en la paz y seguridad del mundo, abandone su plan de tomar la supremacia militar basada en las armas nucleares modernizadas y deje de amenazar con ellas a los paises independientes antiimperialistas como la RPDC, la prevencion de desarrollo de armas nucleares a traves de CTBT quedara como mision imposible.
					
					Solo cuando el CTBT sea cumplido a condicion de que las armas nucleares fueran canceladas completamente en escala mundial, todos los paises podran asumir las obligaciones y derechos practicamente iguales y justos.
					
					En ese sentido, el asunto mas apremiante que el cumplimiento del CTBT es establecer el marco legal internacional sobre la prohibicion incondicional de uso y eliminacion completa de armas nucleares existentes en el ambito mundial y buscar medidas imparciales y proporcionadas para el desarme y la cancelacion basados en la confianza mutua. 
					
					Para hacer efectivo en la realidad el CTBT, deberian preparar sus premisas y para eso, las potencias nucleares deberan cumplir con su responsabilidad y deber en los esfuerzos por eliminar la fuente de guerra nuclear en el mundo. 
					
					Especialmente, es importante para Estados Unidos, la superpotencia nuclear del mundo, parar todos los actos de aumento armamentista que destruyen la estabilidad mundial, tales como la modernizacion y la convencionalizacion de armas nucleares y el desarrollo de nuevas armas ultramodernas que puedan sustituir a aquellas. 
					
					Si EE.UU. no pone punto final a tales maniobras, no terminara en este planeta la nueva carrera armamentista entre las potencias para defender la seguridad y los intereses estrategicos propios y esto producira graves consecuencias para la paz y la estabilidad del mundo. 
					
					Como ha sido aclarado reiteradamente, la RPDC cumplira en el futuro su responsabilidad y deber para la no proliferacion como pais responsable con armas nucleares.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemeride coreana
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el embajador de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 13 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					A la comida fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					German Hermin Ferras Alvarez dijo en su discurso que el desarrollo de relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Cuba no se puede pensar al margen de los esfuerzos abnegados de Fidel Castro Ruz, Raul Castro Ruz y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Expuso la voluntad de fortalecer y desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad entre los dos partidos y los pueblos de ambos paises segun el proposito de los Maximos Dirigentes de ambos paises.
					
					En el nombre del partido, gobierno y pueblo de Cuba, deseo que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un logre exitos en su trabajo responsable para dirigir al pueblo coreano.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop apunto a su vez que cada ano los companeros cubanos celebran el dia de la fundacion de la RPDC, lo cual sirve de una prueba patente del sentimiento hermano y solidaridad dando gran estimulo a la lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Manifesto alegria de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Cuba se fortalecen y se desarrollan invariablemente bajo la profunda atencion de los Maximos Dirigentes de los dos paises.
					
					Deseo que el hermano pueblo cubano, unido compactamente en torno a Fidel Castro Ruz y Raul Castro Ruz, logre mayores exitos en la lucha por frustrar las maniobras de bloqueo anticubano de Estados Unidos, defender las conquistas socialistas y materializar la resolucion del VI Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia aviones para salvar a trabajadores chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia aviones para salvar a trabajadores chinos
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En una zona minera del distrito de Jangjin de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, fueron socorridos 6 trabajadores chinos quienes estaban entre la vida y la muerte por lluvias torrenciales y el derrumbe de monte.
					El 28 de mes expirado, el tifon no.15, que arraso la mayoria de las localidades del pais, tambien ataco al citado distrito y sus moradores sufrieron inmensas perdidas por los chubascos y el desplome de monte.
					
					Debido a las inundaciones, fue interrumpida la comunicacion con la mina. Tambien los trabajadores chinos que se encontraban en la mina sufrieron los danos al igual que los coreanos.
					
					Los habitantes de la zona minera y los trabajadores chinos desplegaron con dinamismo la lucha por superar las calamidades compartiendo el sentimiento calido, pero fueron insuficientes las provisiones y medicamentos y se hizo mas grave la situacion.
					
					Al enterarse de esta noticia, el Mariscal          Kim Jong Un organizo la operacion para salvar a los trabajadores chinos.
					
					Los pilotos se movilizaron urgentemente en acato a la orden del Comandante Supremo, pero se enfrentaron a la situacion mas desfavorable.
					
					Era imposible distinguir la fisonomia de la zona minera debido a la mala condicion atmosferica y el derrumbe de monte ni encontrar el lugar para el aterrizaje del helicoptero.
					
					Gracias a la valentia de los pilotos, el helicoptero se aterrizo y fueron entregados los materiales de socorro, pero no pudo despegarse otra vez a causa del deterioro de sus alas. 
					
					El Mariscal volvio a enviar otro avion diciendo que hay que rescatar, cueste lo que cueste, a los trabajadores chinos.
					
					con la noble obligacion internacionalista y la calida benevolencia del Mariscal, quien presta profunda atencion al desarrollo de relaciones de amistad Corea-China preparadas y continuadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los trabajadores chinos fueron salvados sanamente.
					
					Tan pronto como bajaran del avion, ellos se dirigieron a la embajada china en Corea donde encomendaron transmitir a la parte coreana sus ardientes sentimientos de agradecimiento.
